Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure without amendment. With written report No. 98-255.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 436.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of May 31, 1962 (76 Stat. 89).

summary.text: Establishes May 31, 1967, as the benchmark for the fair market value of specified lands along the Snake River in Idaho which the Secretary of the Interior has been authorized to sell. Sets procedural guidelines for applicants claiming a right of first preference for the purchase of such lands. Precludes reimbursement to anyone for money paid for lands previously acquired under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of May 31, 1962 (76 Stat. 89).
